object.name: transferGift
object.description: Transfers an owned unique gift to another user. Requires the can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts business bot right. Requires can_transfer_stars business bot right if the transfer is paid. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Transfers an owned unique gift to another user. Requires the can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts business bot right. Requires can_transfer_stars business bot right if the transfer is paid. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Transfers an owned unique gift to another user. Requires the *can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts* business bot right. Requires *can_transfer_stars* business bot right if the transfer is paid. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be transferred
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be transferred
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be transferred
annotations.name: owned_gift_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the chat which will own the gift. The chat must be active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the chat which will own the gift. The chat must be active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the chat which will own the gift. The chat must be active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.name: new_owner_chat_id

annotations.description: The amount of Telegram Stars that will be paid for the transfer from the business account balance. If positive, then the can_transfer_stars business bot right is required.
annotations.html_description: The amount of Telegram Stars that will be paid for the transfer from the business account balance. If positive, then the can_transfer_stars business bot right is required.
annotations.rst_description: The amount of Telegram Stars that will be paid for the transfer from the business account balance. If positive, then the *can_transfer_stars* business bot right is required.
annotations.name: star_count
